history.content:
Hi,

I am the reader hiring coordinator for CS61A for this coming Spring 2016. I will be contacting the instructor soon to find out whether they want to hire readers, tutors, or a combination of both. Once they have informed me of their situation, I will make sure that this information is clearly posted on our website so that you will know which application to complete. In the meantime, please hold off on applying. We will send out an email once the applications for Spring 2016 are officially open.

Thanks,

Peter Marchetti
This semester, 61A has tutors rather than readers. However, there are separate applications for tutors and readers. Should I just submit both if I'm interested in this?
history.subject: Will 61A have readers or tutors in the spring?

history.content:
This semester, 61A has tutors rather than readers. However, there are separate applications for tutors and readers. Should I just submit both if I'm interested in this?

Also, semi-related: How stringent are the requirements for becoming a 61A TA? For example, if you happened to have a GPA under 3.0 at the time of applying?
history.subject: Will 61A have readers or tutors in the spring?
